name: The Underworld (Tretara4)
description:
The Underworld is for the Enigma Game Jam.
The Underworld is short, you can beat it like around 10min if you speedrun. (please kill all the enemies).

Controls: w,a,s,d move; mouse look; F pick up and interact; E, Q abilities; SPACE jump; left mouse button Attack; TAB Pause menu
